item.title: 508 help (easy)
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Destiny Pure Destiny
item.description:
@Pure_Destiny wrote:

You need a client, along with the server.
To play; run the server first then run the client. Let it load, then login with a desired username or password.

Read full topic
